entry.title: All of a Sudden His Code Started Throwing Compile Errors -- Incorrect Syntax, Undefined Variables.
entry.content:
He dug through the source and saw her note, words inserted across the lines -- a greeting here, with the global declarations -- a nostalgic recollection of a summer day pinched between the paranthesees of a couple method calls. He traced every error to a memory, an endearment, an apology. At the end, just before the closing bracket, there was a farewell.

i'll miss you;

entry.title: Last Night Andou Asked Me, if You Started Writing a Book Right Now, What Would It Be About?
entry.content: That morning at the last stop, when Sara unzipped her lunchbox to trade her mother's lasagna (secretly full of vegetables) for a bag of chips, a man walked onto the school bus, shot the bus driver, kicked his body out the door, and took the steering wheel.
